detail_desc: Hat in braided paper straw containing glittery threads decorated with pompoms and a thin cord with a bow. Frayed edge around the brim.
Metal hair clip with a large glittery bow at the top and long, curly hair extensions. Length approx. 40 cm.
Hairband in an airy, pleated weave with a ring at the top and covered elastication at the back.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and tapered legs with elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Chest pockets, short sleeves and a narrow tie belt under the bust. Unlined.
Calf-length kaftan in a crêpe weave with short, wide puff sleeves and a smocked seam under the bust. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined, wrapover hood, ribbed cuffs and a straight-cut hem. Soft brushed inside.

Relaxed-fit tops in soft cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a print motif on the front and a rounded hem with a fabric appliqué at the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Relaxed-fit tops in soft cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a print motif on the front and a rounded hem with a fabric appliqué at the front. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a zip fly and button, and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a zip fly and button, and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Ankle-length off-the-shoulder dress in an airy viscose weave with concealed elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues around the arms. Gathered seam at the waist, a soft, detachable belt with a ring fastener, and an airy skirt with a seam at the hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut, ankle-length dress in a softly draping patterned weave. Small, frill-trimmed V-neck opening at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.

Long dress in a patterned viscose weave with elastication and a double flounce at the top and narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps. Narrow, twisted tie belt with tassels at the waist and gathered tiers on the skirt to create movement. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in soft, patterned mesh with a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties that fasten at one side. Extra-long puff sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders and raw edges at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a heavily draping, flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Calf-length dress in soft, patterned mesh with a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties that fasten at one side. Extra-long puff sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders and raw edges at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a heavily draping, flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Calf-length dress in soft, patterned mesh with a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties that fasten at one side. Extra-long puff sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders and raw edges at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a heavily draping, flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Knee-length dress in a crinkled weave with embroidery at the top and a V-shaped opening with narrow, twisted ties at the top. Elbow-length, raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, and frill trimmed seams at the waist, hips and hem. Unlined.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in sturdy cotton twill with adjustable shoulder straps and buttons at the top. Patch front pockets with a decorative flap and button, back pockets and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jumpsuit is partly recycled.

Knee-length dress in washed denim with a square neckline, buttons at the top and short sleeves with elastication and a frill at the hems. Gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Playsuit in washed cotton denim with a square neckline and short puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Buttons down the front, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets, a zip fly and short, wide legs.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck and diagonal buttons down the front. Short sleeves with smocking and a frill trim, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

One-shoulder, ankle-length dress in a patterned viscose weave. One open shoulder and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the other shoulder. Concealed zip in one side, narrow smocking at the waist and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with wide, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a smocked bodice with elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and wide, straight legs. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with wide, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a smocked bodice with elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and wide, straight legs. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with wide, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a smocked bodice with elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and wide, straight legs. Unlined.

Sandals with straps in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening and soles that contain Bloom™ algae foam and are fluted underneath. Bloom™ is a foam material made partly from algae biomass.

5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Loose fit with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, short, unlined sleeves and jetted front pockets. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket’s lining is recycled.

Longer, quilted nylon down jacket with a detachable faux fur-lined hood. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, flap patch front pockets and vents with press-studs at the sides. Lined in a recycled polyester weave.

Sleeveless dress in sequin-embroidered tulle with a wide neckline that is slightly deeper at the back. Concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with a satin tie belt. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit. Fitted style with a round neckline, long sleeves and detachable tie belt under the bust.

Calf-length dress in an airy jacquard-weave blend made from mulberry silk, linen and Tencel™ lyocell. Round, gathered neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.

Palazzo trousers in a silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high waist that has covered elastication at the back and creases at the front for added leg width. Concealed zip in one side and discreet side pockets. Tencel™ lyocell lining at the top.
